name: Organ Grinder
ability: All players keep their eyes closed when voting and the vote tally is secret. Each night, choose if you are drunk until dusk.
firstNightReminder: The Organ Grinder either nods their head yes to be drunk, or shakes their head no to be sober.
otherNightReminder: The Organ Grinder either nods their head yes to be drunk, or shakes their head no to be sober.

jinxes.reason: If the Alchemist has the Organ Grinder ability, the Organ Grinder is in play. If both are sober, both are drunk.
If the Organ Grinder is causing eyes closed voting, the Butler may raise their hand to vote but their vote is only counted if their master voted too.
